src:
Kekalahan di Kandang Dortmund Bakal Jadi Pelajaran Berharga untuk Skuad Inter Milan
06 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Inter Milan tampil mengecewakan ketika menyambangi Borussia Dortmund pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Tim asuhan Antonio Conte itu pulang dengan tangan hampa usai menyerah 2-3.
Kekalahan ini bakal jadi pelajaran berharga untuk skuad Inter. Pasalnya, mereka sempat bermain nyaman di babak pertama dan unggul 2-0 terlebih dahulu. Seharusnya Inter hanya perlu menjaga level permainan yang sama di babak kedua.
Namun, segalanya berubah jadi bencana di babak kedua. Level permainan Inter merosot, mereka membiarkan Dortmund menyamakan kedudukan dalam rentang waktu 13 menit, lalu berbalik tertinggal tak lama kemudian.
Mudah dipahami, Antonio Conte berang. Bek Inter, Diego Godin, pun mengakui kekalahan ini sebagai pukulan besar. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Defeat at Dortmund home will be a valuable lesson for the Inter Milan squad
Nov 6 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Inter Milan appeared disappointing when visited Borussia Dortmund on Matchday 4 Group F Champions League 2019/20, Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs. Antonio Conte's care team went home empty-handed after giving up 2-3.
This defeat will be a valuable lesson for the Inter squad. Because, they had played comfortably in the first round and were 2-0 ahead. Inter should only have to maintain the same level of play in the second half.
However, everything turned into a disaster in the second round. Inter's level of play dropped, they allowed Dortmund to equalize in a span of 13 minutes, then turned behind shortly afterwards.
Easy to understand, Antonio Conte was furious. Inter defender Diego Godin also admitted this defeat as a big blow. Read below, Bolaneters!
